If you persist in getting that error, highlight the text in your address bar (with the error showing) then click on the GO button. This should then download the torrent file.

For anyone who wants to load this onto a USB drive, you can use PeToUSB.

http://gocoding.com/page.php?al=petousb

You just need to extract the ISO and point the program to the folder. Make sure "enable file copy" is checked.
